snippet: A civil rights case exposes years of abuses against Latinos in Arizona.
abstract: Editorial welcomes class-action civil-rights suit brought against Maricopa County, Ariz, Sheriff Joe Arpaio, by the American Civil Liberties Union and others, accusing him of waging an all-out, unlawful campaign of discrimination and harassment against Latinos and those who look like them; contends that trial will expose years of abuses conducted under the aegis of Arizona's immigration law, including illegal stops, searches and arrests that provoked widespread fear among citizens.
lead_paragraph: A civil rights case exposes years of abuses against Latinos in Arizona.
